situation: I can't figure out why my friends don't understand why I want to keep a bit distant during COVID

final_result.label: normal
final_result.response: Both options sound great and could serve different purposes. You might consider asking your friends what they would prefer. Would they enjoy a fun game night together, or do they need some one-on-one time to catch up? Finding out their feelings could help you create a balance that works for everyone.
